timeline.message: add the implementation framework for GORILLA_V2
support encoding INT32 using GORILLA_V2 encoder
add copyright info in modified files

timeline.bodyText: This controlBits can only be 0, 2 and 3, right? How do you think change it and the return type of method readNextClearBit to byte?
timeline.author: HTHou

timeline.message: change the return type of the method readNextClearBit to byte
rename default Gorilla encoding to GORILLA
